introduction-of-openchain-japan-wg.title: Introduction of OpenChain Japan WG
introduction-of-openchain-japan-wg.intro: OpenChain Japan Work Group aims at fostering environment where engineers in Japan and Asia can appropriately use OSS. The goals of Japan WG are to promotes OSS compliance in Japan and Asia, to resolves issues peculiar to Japan, and to share information and store knowledge among members. This session introduces the overview and activities of Japan WG.
introduction-of-openchain-japan-wg.addition:
* Language: English
* Audience: persons who are interested in OSS compliance
* Difficulty: Begineer / 入門

Shinsuke Kato.speaker: Shinsuke Kato
Shinsuke Kato.name: Shinsuke Kato
Shinsuke Kato.intro: Shinsuke Kato is a chief Software Engineer for Panasonic Corporation, where he helped Panasonic R&D improvements to Linux for use in Panasonic's products. About 10 years ago, he had developed the mobile phones which use Linux.. He has been working with Linux and OSS compliance for over 10 years.
